Email: Dear All, Please join me in congratulating Dr. M Agilan, former Doctoral Scholar, Department of Metallurgical and Materials Engineering on being chosen for the “Young Metallurgist Award - Metal Sciences” by the Ministry of Steel.  The award will be given during the National Metallurgist Awards function to be held in November 2023.  He was guided by Prof. G Phanikumar. With regards V. Kamakoti
